messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Enemy communication intercepted. Security level elevated.

A summary has been copied and printed to all communications consoles.

messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Anomaly Alert

Ion storm detected near the station. Please check all AI-controlled equipment for errors.

messages.author: Central Command Update
messages.body: Harambe has been detected onboard the station, please exterminate.

messages.author: Central Command Update
messages.body: Gregory is right, breaking the vow of silence is a capital crime

messages.author: Central Command Update
messages.body: We have detected a mass influx of law changes coming into the AI, uploading more may cause it to malfunction. Be cautious crew.

messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Anomaly Alert

Localized hyper-energetic flux wave detected on long range scanners. Expected location: Quartermaster's Office.

messages.author: Central Command Update
messages.body: Crew, we are detecting unknown signatures coming fro-#)%*#^)^$)^! Connection lost. Please contact Central Command for live support.

messages.author: Central Command Update
messages.body: Due to  your performance this shift, we are going to speed up the shuttle.

messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Central Command Higher Dimensional Affairs

An acausal dimensional event has been detected in your sector. Event has been flagged EXTINCTION-CLASS. Directing all available assets toward simulating solutions. SOLUTION ETA: 60 SECONDS.
